name: SkyJumper
description:
Ron jumped from a parachute when he realized that everything had changed around him, and he seemed to be in another dimension, which is trying to absorb him with all his might into its chaos.

SkyJumper - Side Scroller with Runner elements. A game in which the player parries with a flying parachutist and dodges obstacles and sharp blades that fold on the move, which line up randomly and each time complicate the race. The world of the game also changes randomly, from weather effects to the time of day.

Features of the game:
- Changeable world on the go
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
- Complexity
